backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining content, skills, recruiter visit logging, visitor messages, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD APIs using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that drops the old ownerPassword field and returns an empty upgraded actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature‑evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for deployment cloning and app‑name updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/.env.hatem23: Environment file defining app name and owner name for the Hatem23 deployment.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting document title to Hatem23 and mounting the React root.
frontend/README-Hatem23-deployment.md: Documentation explaining build steps, environment variables, and backend separation for the Hatem23 deployment clone.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that sets the document title, runs recruiter‑prompt gating, loads backend content and skills, and renders all resume sections and contact details.
frontend/src/appConfig.ts: Loads deployment‑specific app and owner names from environment variables with defaults.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Certi: Owner‑panel subeditor allowing add, edit, expand, and delete operations for certification items using local state and callbacks.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Conte: Main panel for editing site content, loading current data, managing draft state, and saving updates.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Educa: Allows adding, editing, expanding, and deleting education entries with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Exper: Manages experience items, supporting creation, editing fields, expand/collapse, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Hobbi: Enables adding and removing hobby strings with delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Owner: Provides password-gated owner panel navigation for viewing visits, messages, and editing content.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Proje: Handles project list editing including adding, updating fields, expansion, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Recru: Displays recruiter visit logs with loading, error, formatting, and a clear-all function using confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Skill: Provides UI to add, edit, and delete skills with mutation hooks and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Visit: Shows visitor messages sorted by timestamp with clear-all functionality, loading states, and error handling.
Renders a list of projects with expandable details and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/RecruiterPromptM: Prompts visitors to identify as recruiters and optionally provide company name, then logs the visit.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wraps content in a scroll-animated section using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Creates a scrolling top navigation bar that highlights the active section and supports smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/VisitorMessageFo: React form component that collects visitor name, email, and message and submits it via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides a query to check if the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useContent.ts: Hooks to fetch and update site content through the backend actor with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, and stored identities via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for secret messages (placeholder), and CRUD operations for skills via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecruiterVisit.ts: Hooks to log recruiter visits, fetch visit logs, and clear them using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorMessages.ts: Hooks to submit, fetch, and clear visitor messages through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and utility classes for consistent styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/resumeContent.ts: Static JSON-like object containing resume data including hero info, education, experience, skills, and certifications.
frontend/src/utils/ownerAccess.ts: Empty utility file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/ownerPanelAccess.ts: Exports a constant password string for owner panel access.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters from query or hash, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s specification, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for the resume website clone “Hatem23.”
